title: [Chip n' Dwight's]
description: Cluttered with models, the shop has black walls, black ceilings, and black frames around the windows and door, though the floor is golden brown with a veneer that reflects the sunlight as it streams in from outside.  Surrounded by bulletin boards that are overloaded with tacked parchments, a small long-legged desk with a tall stool behind it sits under the dim glow of a shielded lantern.
